strapiPost.title: A & M Railroad Plans April Special Events
strapiPost.content:
Have you ever wanted to take a train ride like you see in the movies? The Arkansas & Missouri Railroad allows you to do just that from right here in Northwest Arkansas!

  • All aboard: The train has meticulously restored antique passenger cars, a first-class parlor car, and a 1940s Caboose called Lil’ Toot. Prices start at $46 and vary depending on the car you’re in and the destinations you choose. 
  • Hop on: The A & M Railroad’s latest special excursions are the following two Saturdays in April (April 9 & 16) and they’re calling them the “HIP-PITY HOP EGGSPRESS.” The trips are from Springdale to Van Buren and from Van Buren to Winslow. 

For more information about the train or to make reservations, click HERE.
